Package com.example.scandroid

package com.example.scandroid
  • Class
    Description
    AdminInspectEventFragment
    AdminInspectEventFragment is shown when a user with admin permissions browses and clicks on an event Allows the admin user to view event name, date, location, and gives the option to remove the event from the system
    AdminInspectImageFragment
    AdminInspectImageFragment is shown when a user clicks on a profile picture or event poster while browsing events and users.
    AdminInspectUserFragment
    AdminInspectUserFragment is shown when a user with admin permissions browses and clicks on an user profile Allows the admin user to view the selected user's name, email, phone number, and about me.
    AdminKeyFragment
    A DialogFragment that represents an administrative key input dialog.
    AdminViewsTests
     
    AllowAccessCameraRollFragment
    A dialog asking users if they wish to remove their profile picture/event poster or select an image from their gallery as their new profile picture/event poster
    AnnouncementsArrayAdapter
    AnnouncementsArrayAdapter is an ArrayAdapter used for displaying event announcements in a list view
    BitmapCallback
    To handle the asynchronous nature of Firebase operations and
    ensure that the Bitmap is retrieved before returning, you can
    modify the method to use a callback or a Task to handle the result.
    BitmapConfigurator
    BitmapConfigurator manipulates Drawable objects by converting them into Bitmaps
    BrowseActivity
    BrowseActivity is activity for browsing all users and events in the app It extends AppCompatActivity in order to be compatible with older versions of Android as well as use modern Android features.
    BrowseActivityPageAdapter
    BrowseActivityPageAdapter class is responsible for managing the BrowseEventsFragment and BrowseUsersFragment displayed in BrowseActivity's ViewPager2 (tabs).
    BrowseEventsAndPostersTest
     
    BrowseEventsFragment
    BrowseEventsFragment handles the list of all events in BrowseActivity A simple Fragment subclass.
    BrowseSignedUpEventsTest
     
    BrowseUsersFragment
    BrowseUsersFragment handles the list of all users in BrowseActivity A simple Fragment subclass.
    CaptureAct
    CaptureAct is the capture activity for scanning barcodes within the application.
    CheckInConfirmationFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    CheckInScreenActivity
    The AppCompatActivity representing the Check-In screen activity.
    CheckInScreenActivityTest
     
    CreatedEventsArrayAdapter
    CreatedEventsArrayAdapter is an ArrayAdapter implementation used in the app for displaying created events in a list view.
    CreatedEventsArrayAdapter.OnEventPosterClickListener
    Interface to allow for communication with host activity Used for communicating about an ImageView listener of event poster in the array
    CreateEventActivity
    The view for when Users wish to create a new event or edit an existing event's parameters
    CreateEventActivityTests
     
    CreateEventActivityTests.PickerAction
     
    DBAccessor
    Represents interface between scANDROID and Firestore database.
    DBAFirestoreTest
    Testcases for DBAccessor.
    DeviceIDRetriever
    DeviceIDRetriever is a class responsible for obtaining a device's unique ID when they first open the app.
    EditEventActivity
    EditEventActivity is an activity that links all of the necessary activities for an event organizer: CreateEventActivity, EventAttendeesActivity, EventQRCodesActivity, EventQRCodesActivity, EventCreateAnnouncementsActivity, EventLocationTrackingActivity, and EventMilestonesActivity.
    EditEventActivityTest
     
    EditEventActivityTest.PickerAction
     
    EditProfileActivity
    The EditProfileActivity class allows users to edit their profile information, including name, email, phone number, about me, push notification preferences, and profile picture.
    EditProfileActivityTests
     
    Event
    Represents an Event in the scANDROID app for CMPUT 301 at UofA W24.
    Events are created by Users (as an Organizer) and attended by Users (as an Attendee).
    Event.CheckIn
    Represents an Attendee of the Event.
    EventAttendeesActivity
    EventAttendeesActivity is a class responsible for displaying event attendees and providing search functionality.
    EventAttendeesArrayAdapter
    Array adapter for the list of users that are attending an event
    EventCallback
    EventCallback is an interface used for handling event callbacks.
    EventCheckInActivity
    EventCheckInActivity is shown when a check-in QR code is scanned in QRScannerActivity, and allows a user to see event details, allow push notifications, allow location tracking, and check into an event.
    EventCreateAnnouncementActivity
    EventCreateAnnouncementActivity allows an event organizer create notifications and schedule for them to be sent to event attendees.
    EventInfoActivity
    EventInfoActivity is an activity that is shown when an event attendee clicks on their event from their "Attending Events" tab on their HomepageActivity.
    EventLocationTrackingActivity
    EventLocationTrackingActivity is an activity that shows an event organizer a map with pointers to where event attendees checked into their event from.
    EventMilestonesActivity
    EventMilestonesActivity is an activity that shows an event organizer a list of the milestones they hit for their event.
    EventMilestonesArrayAdapter
    EventMilestonesArrayAdapter is a class responsible for EventMilestones in the EventMilestonesActivity.
    EventQRCodesActivity
    EventQRCodesActivity is an activity that displays the Promo and Check-In QR Codes for an event, and allows the event organizer to share the QR Codes to other apps or email.
    EventSignUpsActivity
    Activity to display attendees signed up for an event
    EventTest
    Event test cases for all methods and nested classes
    EventViewAnnouncementsActivity
    EventViewAnnouncementsActivity is an Activity which allows for viewing announcements related to an event.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    FCMNotificationService
    instance of FCMN notification class allows for token retrieval
    HomepageActivity
    HomepageActivity is the main page of the app, and deals with displaying and updating the user's profile.
    HomepageActivityPageAdapter
    HomepageActivityPageAdapter class is responsible for managing the MyEventsFragment and AttendingEventsFragment displayed in HomepageActivity's ViewPager2 (tabs).
    HomepageActivityTest
     
    LimitAttendeesFragment
    Code for the Limit Attendees Fragment that is called upon clicking a button within the creation of an event.
    ListIDCallback
    ListIDCallback is an interface used for handling list retrieval callbacks.
    LocationGeocoder
    LocationGeocoder can be used to determine the latitude and longitude of locations It can also determine a location based on latitude and longitude
    LocationRetriever
    class for retrieving the current location of the device
    MyEventsFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    NoticeFragment
    Popup fragment for the purpose of alerting users
    onClickListener
    Interface for allowing communication about a view's listener across 2 different activities
    ProfileInfoActivity
    Displays a User's profile when either an organizer selects an attendee from the list of users attending their event or they are selected from the list when browsing all users.
    ProfilePictureGenerator
    Generates a profile picture for when users remove their picture or do not have one yet
    QRCodeGeneratorTest
     
    QRCodeGeneratorTest.PickerAction
     
    QRScannerActivity
    QRScannerActivity activity provides functionality for scanning QR Codes using the device's camera.
    QRScannerActivityTest
     
    SendAnnouncementTest
     
    SignUpTest
     
    Tuple<A,B>
    Tuple class for holding 2 objects
    User
    Represents a User in the scANDROID app for CMPUT 301 at UofA W24.
    UserCallback
    UserCallback is an interface used for handling user retrieval callbacks.
    UsersArrayAdapter
    UsersArrayAdapter is an ArrayAdapter implementation used in the app for displaying a list of users

    UserTest
    User test cases for all methods
    WelcomeFragment
    A DialogFragment that represents a welcome screen prompting the user to enter their name or proceed as a guest.
